sql-select.name: GetDatabaseBackupHistory
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tBS.[database_name] AS [DatabaseName] ,tBS.[type] AS [BackupType] ,tBS.[backup_finish_date] AS [BackupFinishDate] ,CONVERT([NUMERIC](20, 2), tBS.[backup_size] / (CONVERT([NUMERIC](20, 2), 1024.0 * 1024.0))) AS [DatabaseBackupSizeMB] FROM [msdb].[dbo].[backupset] tBS WHERE tBS.[server_name] = @@SERVERNAME AND tBS.[backup_finish_date] IS NOT NULL AND tBS.[type] = ISNULL(@chBackupType, tBS.[type]) AND tBS.[backup_finish_date] > DATEADD(mm, -1, GETDATE()) ORDER BY tBS.[backup_finish_date] DESC;
